mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RemoteConfig(name, comment, type, appId, uid, defaultTag, updateTime) VALUES(#{name}, #{comment}, #{type}, #{appId}, #{uid}, #{defaultTag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE RemoteConfig SET `name`=#{name},type=#{type},`comment`=#{comment},uid=#{uid}, updateTime=null WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM RemoteConfig WHERE id=#{1} LIMIT 0,1

SELECT a.*, b.name as author, ( SELECT count( * ) FROM RemoteConfigParam WHERE envid = a.id ) AS subItemsCount FROM RemoteConfig a LEFT JOIN User b on a.uid = b.id WHERE a.appId = #{0} AND a.type = #{1} ORDER BY updateTime DESC

SELECT a.*, b.`name` AS appname, ( SELECT count( * ) FROM RemoteConfigParam WHERE envid = a.id ) subItemsCount FROM RemoteConfig a LEFT JOIN Project b ON a.appId = b.id WHERE a.appId=#{0} and a.type = #{1} ORDER BY a.id DESC limit #{2.begin},#{2.end}
SELECT a.* FROM RemoteConfig a LEFT JOIN Project b on a.appId = b.id WHERE b.identify = #{0} ORDER BY a.updateTime DESC
